# ğ“ƒ€ ğ“ˆ– [ğ“…¡](ğ“…¡.html) [ğ“…·](ğ“…·.html) [ğ“…£](ğ“…£.html) [PHOENIX](https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/%CF%86%CE%BF%E1%BF%96%CE%BD%CE%B9%CE%BE)

Wanderwort, strongly related to the far-spread [Venus](Venus.html) religion and later (non-exhaustive!) Phoenician ethnie.  
A word similar to Phoenician is needed used in a similar way as Bhuddhist, Christian and Muslim:  

Pinikian / Piniker := Follower of the Phoenike (Pinikism?) religion:

Ï†Î¿á¿–Î½á¿Î¾ â€¢ (phoÃ®nix) m (genitive Ï†Î¿Î¯Î½á¿‘ÎºÎ¿Ï‚); third declension
